Class ConnectedState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.client.state.ClientControllerState
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.client.state.ConnectedState
public class ConnectedState extends ClientControllerState
Represents the state of the client after having successfully connected to the game server.

  • Constructor Details

    • ConnectedState

      public ConnectedState(ClientController controller, ClientView view, String username, ServerConnection connection, ThreadSafeMessageQueue<ClientMessage> inqueue)
      Construct a ConnectedState object.
      Parameters:
      controller - ClientController Controller to which this state is tied to.
      view - ClientView View to which this state is tied to.
      username - Username with which the client has connected to the server.
      connection - A established connection to the server.
      inqueue - A queue used to send messages to the server.
